name: DEBRIS (itch) (chairishgames)
description:
Play Asteroids with a spin; you are your worst enemy!

Escape the invading enemy forces by flying through a perilous asteroid field towards the warp gate. Save as many survivors along the way as you can and force your way through the debris of your home planet together.

Made in 72 (really only 48) hours for GameDevLeague May 2018 Jam. The theme was "Remake a classic game with a spin". 

Features:

  • Maneuver the perilous debris fields of your ex-home-planet and journey to the east of space to reach the warp gate
  • Escape the mothership
  • Save as many survivors as you can

CONTROLS

Rotate shipLeft/Right ArrowAccelerateUp Arrow
ShootSpace

Tools: Unity 2018, Photoshop, Audacity

Third Party Attributions: NONE
